article.title: Artificial Intelligence and Strategic Decision‑Making
article.summary: The paper investigates how large‑language‑model‑driven AI can augment strategic decision‑making in firms, offering a framework and empirical evidence from startup competitions.
article.perspective: Technical‑centric analysis of AI as a decision‑support tool.
article.author: Felipe A. Csaszar, Harsh Ketkar, Hyunjin Kim

article.title: LLM‑POTUS Score: Analyzing Presidential Debates with Large‑Language Models
article.summary: Introduces a quantitative framework to evaluate political discourse using LLMs; applies to US presidential debates, showing bias‑drift and alignment challenges.
article.perspective: Methodological analysis of LLM‑based political text analysis.
article.author: Zhengliang Liu, Yiwei Li, Oleksandra Zolotarevych, Rongwei Yang, Tianming Liu
